info.title: ServerManagement
info.description: REST API for Azure Server Management Service.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API Version.

default.description: Default Response. It will be deserialized as per the error definition specified in the schema, and an exception will be thrown.

EncryptionJwkResource.description: The public key of the gateway.

upgradeMode.description: The upgradeMode property gives the flexibility to gateway to auto upgrade itself. If properties value not specified, then we assume upgradeMode = Automatic.

GatewayParameters.description: Collection of parameters for operations on a gateway resource.

environment.description: The environment for the gateway (DEV, DogFood, or Production).

statusBlobSignature.description: The gateway status blob SAS URL.

GatewayProfile.description: JSON properties that the gateway service uses know how to communicate with the resource.

created.description: UTC date and time when gateway was first added to management service.

instances.description: Names of the nodes in the gateway.

publishedTimeUtc.description: The date/time of the last published gateway.

updated.description: UTC date and time when node was last updated.

upgradeMode.description: The upgradeMode property gives the flexibility to gateway to auto upgrade itself. If properties value not specified, then we assume upgradeMode = Automatic.

GatewayResource.description: Data model for an arm gateway resource.

nextLink.description: The URL to the next set of resources.

availableMemoryMByte.description: The available memory on the gateway host machine in megabytes.

friendlyOsName.description: The Plaintext description of the OS on the gateway.

gatewayCpuUtilizationPercent.description: The CPU utilization of the gateway process (numeric value between 0 and 100).

gatewayVersion.description: The version of the gateway that is installed on the system.

gatewayWorkingSetMByte.description: The working set size of the gateway process in megabytes.

installedDate.description: The date the gateway was installed.

latestPublishedMsiVersion.description: Latest published version of the gateway install MSI.

logicalProcessorCount.description: Number of logical processors in the gateway system.

name.description: The computer name of the gateway system.

secondaryEncryptionCertificateThumbprint.description: Secondary thumbprint of the encryption certificate.

statusUpdated.description: UTC date and time when gateway status was last updated.

totalCpuUtilizationPercent.description: CPU Utilization of the whole system.

gatewayId.description: Gateway ID which will manage this node.

userName.description: User name to be used to connect to node.

NodeParameters.description: Parameter collection for operations on arm node resource.

created.description: UTC date and time when node was first added to management service.

updated.description: UTC date and time when node was last updated.

nextLink.description: The URL to the next set of resources.

NodeResources.description: A collection of node resource objects.

PowerShellCommandParameters.description: The parameters to a PowerShell script execution command.

backgroundColor.description: The HTML color string representing the background color.

descriptions.description: Collection of PromptFieldDescription objects that contains the user input.

exitCode.description: The exit code from a executable that was called from PowerShell.

foregroundColor.description: The HTML color string representing the foreground color.

value.description: Actual result text from the PowerShell Command.

PowerShellCommandResult.description: Results from invoking a PowerShell command.

PowerShellCommandResults.description: A collection of results from a PowerShell command.

PowerShellCommandStatus.description: Result status from invoking a PowerShell command.

disconnectedOn.description: Timestamp of last time the service disconnected from the runspace.

PowerShellSessionResource.description: A PowerShell session resource (practically equivalent to a runspace instance).

nextLink.description: The URL to the next set of resources.

PowerShellSessionResources.description: A collection of PowerShell session resources

command.description: Command to get tab completion for.

PowerShellTabCompletionParameters.description: Collection of parameters for PowerShell tab completion.

PowerShellTabCompletionResults.description: An array of strings representing the different values that can be selected through.

helpMessage.description: The help message of the prompt.

label.description: The label text of the prompt.

promptFieldTypeIsList.description: When set to 'true' the prompt field type is a list of values.

PromptFieldDescription.description: Field description for the implementation of PSHostUserInterface.Prompt

response.description: The list of responses a cmdlet expects.

PromptMessageResponse.description: The response to a prompt message.

password.description: Encrypted Password associated with user name.

userName.description: Encrypted User name to be used to connect to node.

SessionParameters.description: Parameter collection for creation and other operations on sessions.

created.description: UTC date and time when node was first added to management service.

updated.description: UTC date and time when node was last updated.

userName.description: The username connecting to the session.

build.description: The third number of the version.

major.description: The leftmost number of the version.

majorRevision.description: The MSW of the fourth part.

minor.description: The second leftmost number of the version.

minorRevision.description: The LSW of the fourth part.

revision.description: The fourth number of the version.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
